thread.title: Tom Brady's Missing Super Bowl Jersey Reportedly Valued at $500,000
thread.title_full: Tom Brady's Missing Super Bowl Jersey Reportedly Valued at $500,000

author: Alex Ungerman
title: Tom Brady's Missing Super Bowl Jersey Reportedly Valued at $500,000
text: Tom Brady's Missing Super Bowl Jersey Reportedly Valued at $500,000 by Alex Ungerman 4:47 PM PST, February 21, 2017 Playing Tom Brady's Missing Super Bowl Jersey Reportedly Valued at $500,000 The case of the missing jersey continues... Tom Brady's Super Bowl LI jersey, which mysteriously went missing earlier this month after the New England Patriots quarterback won his fifth NFL championship, has been valued at $500,000, according to a police report obtained by TMZ . MORE: Gisele Bundchen and Tom Brady Named 2017 Met Gala Co-Chairs: See Their Dazzling Appearances Over the Years! According to the report, Houston police are investigating the crime as a first degree felony. “Somebody stole my winning jersey!” Brady was overheard saying in a locker room video after winning the big game. Robert Kraft handing out victory cigars, including a special visit to TB12. pic.twitter.com/4GVyJdbrfw
